title: Chronological Avengers Part 1
description:
This is an honest attempt at chronologically assembling all of the Avengers titles along with the solo titles of the original members, i.e. Captain America, Iron Man, Thor, and the Hulk. This also includes most appearances, crossovers, and complete major Marvel events. Any comments would be appreciated in order to improve future additions. It's my hope to eventually sort these titles from beginning to current. Even though this has been a huge pain 100% credit belongs to the original scanners!!!
Contents:
Thor: Son of Asgard #1-12
Thor Annual v1 #5,8
Adventures of Captain America: Sentinel of Liberty #1-4
Batman & Captain America
Giant Sized Invaders v1 #1
Invaders v1 #1-41
Marvel Premiere #29,30
Invaders Annual v1 #1
Before the Fantastic Four: Ben Grimm & Logan #1-3
Journey Into Mystery #83-112
Hulk v1 #1-6
Incredible Hulk vs Superman
Tales of Suspense #39-59
Fantastic Four #12,16,25,26,31
Amazing Spider-Man #14,18
Tales to Astonish #35-59
Avengers v1 #1-9
Avengers: The Origin
Iron Man: The Iron Age #1-2
Iron Man: Enter the Mandarin #1-6
Strange Tales #123
Untold Tales of Spider-Man #17
Untold Tales of Spider-Man Annual 1997
Amazing Spider-Man Annual #1
Hulk Smash Avengers #1

Enjoy!!!Please Seed!!!
